p.LEV: note chars do not need to be escaped if they are not in a position to be interpreted as special chars. eg quote marks only need to be escaped if they are in tag contents.

LEV.p: There are no escape sequences for dots (.) or equals (=), therefore these can not be used in idents, and "=" can not be used in tag contents.
The following always need to be escaped if literal chars: [,],{,},|,~
